original_text: Ahaziah had become king of Judah when Ahab's son Joram had been king of Israel for 11 years.
korean_text: 아합의 아들 요람의 제십일년에 아하시야가 유다 왕이 되었었더라

sentences.original_text: Ahaziah had become king of Judah
when Ahab's son Joram had been king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 아합의 아들 요람이 이스라엘의 왕이었을 때
